credit_line: Museum gift in loving memory of Robert Kaufmann, by his sister, Catherine Tatum
title: Armchair
provenance:
Owned by former CHNDM librarian Robert Kaufman. No prior information is available about this chair's provenance. although it is one of a set of eight with another arm and six side chairs.
Gift: Gift from the Estate of Robert Kaufman, former CHNDM librarian; offered by his sister, Catherine Tatum, 2009.
description: Upholstered seat and back with decorative brass nail heads, incised decoration on wood frame, the seat supported on diagonal front legs reinforced by a turned stretcher, slightly splayed back legs rise to seat back.
name: Armchair
